cards.title: I built an AI secretary that lives in your WhatsApp — and it's not just another chatbot
tldr: **irel is an AI secretary for WhatsApp that automates tasks beyond simple chatbot interactions.**
It provides features like email auto-triaging, smart reminders, and daily briefs for schedules and priorities.
The tool enables 'Jobs' for autonomous, recurring delegations, assisting with personal and professional organization.

cards.title: Milan-based Contents secures €5.9 million for AI workflow platform, sets up Doha hub for Middle East expansion
tldr: **Milan-based Contents secured €5.9 million to advance its AI workflow platform.**
The company is expanding into the Middle East with a new hub in Doha.
The investment supports scaling AI-powered solutions, relevant for optimizing various business processes.

cards.title: The A3 Handoff Canvas: Six Questions That Turn AI Delegation Into a Repeatable Workflow
tldr: **The A3 Handoff Canvas provides a structured approach for delegating tasks to AI.**
It utilizes six key questions to ensure clarity and effectiveness in AI assignments.
The framework aims to transform AI delegation into a consistent and repeatable workflow.

cards.title: How Workers powers our internal maintenance scheduling pipeline
tldr: **Cloudflare built an internal maintenance scheduling pipeline powered by Cloudflare Workers.**
The system automates the scheduling and execution of critical infrastructure maintenance tasks.
This internal solution enhances reliability and efficiency for Cloudflare's global network.

cards.title: Introducing Markdown for Agents
tldr: Cloudflare introduces Markdown support, enabling agents to format communications for improved clarity and structure.
This feature allows agents to use bolding, italics, lists, and code blocks for more effective information exchange.
Enhances internal communication and documentation, which could assist PMO teams in standardizing project updates and knowledge sharing.

cards.title: Workflow Automation for Teams: Processes, Tools & Best Practices
tldr: **The article outlines workflow automation for teams, covering processes, tools, and best practices.**
It details how automating repetitive tasks can significantly boost team efficiency and communication.
These automation principles are relevant to project teams seeking to optimize operational workflows and task management.

cards.title: How Mid-Size Businesses Can Unlock Productivity with Agentic Automation
tldr: **Mid-size businesses can unlock significant productivity gains through agentic automation implementation.**
Agentic automation utilizes AI agents to autonomously perform tasks and achieve business objectives.
This technology can streamline operations, automate repetitive tasks, and enhance strategic decision-making.

cards.title: Launched SmartPack: Persistent AI assistants with one paste
tldr: **SmartPack launches persistent AI assistants that streamline tasks with a single paste action.**
The tool enhances productivity by automating repetitive tasks and integrating with existing workflows.
SmartPack could assist with managing project-related tasks more efficiently.

cards.title: Agent-Diff: Benchmarking LLM Agents on Enterprise API Tasks via Code Execution with State-Diff-Based Evaluation
tldr: Agent-Diff introduces a new benchmarking framework for evaluating LLMs on enterprise API tasks.
The framework assesses performance based on code execution and state-diff evaluation.
It addresses variability in LLM performance due to model differences and external tool access.

cards.title: Composition-RL: Compose Your Verifiable Prompts for Reinforcement Learning of Large Language Models
tldr: **Composition-RL introduces a method for creating verifiable prompts for reinforcement learning in large language models.**
The approach enhances the reliability of AI-generated responses through structured prompt composition.
This research contributes to the field of AI by improving the training processes of large language models.

cards.title: Turning down the heat: Researcher identifies better way to remove heat from AI data centers
tldr: **Researcher identifies a better method for removing heat from AI data centers.**
The new technique aims to improve thermal management for high-performance AI infrastructure.
This innovation addresses critical cooling challenges in rapidly expanding AI data centers.

cards.title: AI isn't getting smarter, it's getting more power hungry - and expensive
tldr: **An MIT report suggests AI models are becoming more power-hungry and expensive, not necessarily smarter.**
The report highlights the increasing computational and financial costs associated with developing advanced AI.
This trend raises concerns about the sustainability and accessibility of future AI advancements.

cards.title: The cure for the AI hype hangover
tldr: **The article addresses the prevailing 'AI hype hangover' in enterprises, advocating for realistic expectations.**
It emphasizes that enterprise AI is not a 'magic key' for instant solutions or transformative results.
Businesses must adopt a grounded, strategic approach to AI implementation, moving beyond inflated promises.

cards.title: On Agent Frameworks and Agent Observability
tldr: LangChain asserts agent frameworks remain vital, evolving alongside continuous LLM advancements.
The article details LangChain's three generations of agent frameworks, from chaining to tool-calling.
It emphasizes agent observability via LangSmith, crucial regardless of the chosen framework.

cards.title: Google DeepMind Introduces Aletheia: The AI Agent Moving from Math Competitions to Fully Autonomous Professional Research Discoveries
tldr: **Google DeepMind introduces Aletheia, an AI agent for autonomous professional research discoveries.**
Aletheia represents a significant advancement from solving math competitions to complex research tasks.
This AI agent aims to perform fully autonomous research, potentially accelerating scientific breakthroughs.

cards.title: Wesfarmers to deploy agentic AI groupwide
tldr: **Wesfarmers announces its intention to deploy agentic AI technologies across its entire group.**
This initiative represents a significant strategic move towards enterprise-wide AI integration.
The deployment aims to leverage advanced agentic AI capabilities throughout various business units.

cards.title: OpenAI engineering boss says 95 per cent staff using Codex AI Agent, terms human engineers sorcerers
tldr: **OpenAI's engineering boss reports 95% staff adoption of the Codex AI Agent.**
The high adoption rate indicates significant integration of AI tools within OpenAI's development processes.
The boss referred to human engineers as 'sorcerers,' emphasizing their augmented capabilities with AI.

cards.title: Microsoft AI CEO Mustafa Suleyman predicts White collar job automation within 18 months, says: AI agents will be able to ...
tldr: **Microsoft AI CEO Mustafa Suleyman predicts significant white-collar job automation.**
This widespread automation is expected to occur within the next 18 months.
The prediction emphasizes the rapidly advancing capabilities of AI agents in professional roles.

cards.title: How IT operations is being reimagined with AI and Automation
tldr: **AI and automation are fundamentally transforming how IT operations are managed.**
These technologies aim to enhance efficiency, reduce manual intervention, and optimize processes.
The article explores the ongoing revolution in IT operations driven by intelligent automation.

cards.title: NTUC to roll out AI training pathways for workers at all skill levels, subsidy for AI tools
tldr: **NTUC announces AI training pathways for workers across all skill levels.**
Subsidies will be provided for AI tools to support this initiative.
The program aims to facilitate a just transition for workers in the evolving job market.
